item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, September 25, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Orion, our first true augmented reality glasses (401 points | 302 comments)
2. Show HN: Httpdbg – A tool to trace the HTTP requests sent by your Python code (75 points | 33 comments)
3. Llama 3.2: Revolutionizing edge AI and vision with open, customizable models (124 points | 55 comments)

27. Who is Marcellus Williams: Execution in Missouri despite evidence of innocence (166 points | 150 comments)

29. A Brief History of Microprogramming (2022) (15 points | 3 comments)
30. Reconductoring: Boosting U.S. Grid Capacity Efficiently (30 points | 21 comments)
